name: Piggie Star Adventure
description:
SkyPengu Games' first adventure-length game!

Piggie Star Adventure is a simple, lighthearted platformer inspired by classic Kirby and Mario games.

Updates

1.2

  • Final boss attacks when close to death have been slowed down
  • Fixed password bug that would leave you at 0 health
  • Sped up reflected projectiles during final boss
  • Added a tiny, silly easter egg to the end screen!!

1.1

  • Fixed a bug where the final boss would stop attacking
